text: The 3 arrondissements of the Haute-Loire department are: # Arrondissement of Brioude, (subprefecture: Brioude) with 111 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 45,768 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Le Puy-en-Velay, (prefecture of the Haute-Loire department: Le Puy-en-Velay) with 102 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 96,498 in 2016. # Arrondissement of Yssingeaux, (subprefecture: Yssingeaux) with 44 communes. The population of the arrondissement was 85,073 in 2016. ==History== In 1800 the arrondissements of Le Puy, Brioude and Yssingeaux were established. The arrondissement of Yssingeaux was disbanded in 1926, and restored in 1942.Historique de la Haute- Loire In January 2007 the arrondissement of Brioude absorbed the canton of Saugues from the arrondissement of Le Puy-en-Velay. ==References== Haute-Loire
title: Arrondissements of the Haute-Loire department
